meanings.definition: The act of prescribing too much medication.
meanings.sent1: The overprescription of antibiotics can lead to antibiotic resistance.
meanings.sent2: Her doctor's overprescription of painkillers caused her to feel drowsy all the time.
meanings.sent3: The overprescription of vitamins to the plants made them grow so fast they almost took over the garden!
meanings.sent4: The overprescription of tasks to the team overwhelmed them like a tidal wave.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of overprescription were evident in the overflowing medicine cabinet.

meanings.definition: The state of having been prescribed an excessive amount of medication.
meanings.sent1: After the overprescription, she had to deal with the side effects of multiple medications.
meanings.sent2: His overprescription led to a cluttered medicine cabinet full of unused pills.
meanings.sent3: The overprescription of candy to the kids resulted in a hyperactive birthday party!
meanings.sent4: The overprescription of compliments made her doubt their sincerity.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of overprescription were evident in the overflowing medicine cabinet.
